mapper.insert: insert into product(product_id, category_id, member_id, title, content, sdate, edate, price, photo, wdate, state, del) values((select LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(product_id) + 1, 1), 4, 0) from product p), ${category_id}, ${member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, timestamp(#{sdate}), timestamp(#{edate}), ${price}, #{photo}, now(), 0, 0);
